attributes.action: Start accepting petitions which may not fit your agenda. Lose the censorship!
attributes.additional_details: Many people have opinions and demands (yes demands are appropriate, you are the servants!), and many opinions may not be quite what you would like. But if you are to offer a voice. Do us the courtesy of publishing, listening and giving a fair response. Rather than a few words via Email telling us what idiots we are!
attributes.background: Yougov offer the opportunity to start petitions. Yet dismiss any which don't fit with Government agenda. If you offer people (The voters) a window. At least be fair and democratic about how you judge them.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the rules for petitions.
